title: Exploring Informal Learning in Instructional Designers: Qualitative Research-Based Mathematics Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding Basic Mathematics Education Theory and Fundamental Principles of Instructional Design
context.additional_context: Analyzing informal learning cases in real mathematics education settings and exploring instructional design processes by applying qualitative research methodologies

learning_goals: One can identify and explain three or more cases of informal learning occurring in the math instructional design process.
One can systematically analyze instructional designers' learning experiences using qualitative research methodologies (interviews, observations, thematic analysis).
Evaluate the impact of informal learning on mathematics education design and propose improvement strategies

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
